description: Golden reference datasets for cross-platform validation
purpose: CI validates that Python outputs match MATLAB reference implementation

datasets.name: sinewave_jitter_400fs
datasets.description: Sinewave with 400fs jitter - baseline analog analysis test

workflow.update_reference: Run MATLAB tests locally, then copy test_output/ results to test_reference/
workflow.ci_validation: CI loads dataset/, runs Python, compares against test_reference/
